author: ETA PRIME
description:
In this video, we take a deep dive into the OneXPlayer APEX, one of the most insane handheld gaming PCs ever built. This new powerhouse doesn’t just push boundaries—it breaks them with up to 120 W TDP when paired with its external Frost Bay liquid cooler.
We’ll cover everything you need to know: specs, design, pricing, and why this might be the most ambitious handheld ever made. With up to Ryzen AI Max+ 395, 128 GB RAM, 8 TB of storage, and a hot-swappable 85 Wh battery, this thing is built like a mini desktop.

Learn More Here: https://www.indiegogo.com/en/projects/one-netbook/onexfly-apex-world-s-most-powerful-8-inch-handheld

title: The ONEXFLY APEX Will Be The Craziest Handheld Yet! It's Water Cooled!
